## LECTure

```{r}
yap <- tibble(
  w = 1:1000,
  X = case_when(
    w %% 2 == 0 ~ 0,
    w %% 3 == 0 ~ 1,
    TRUE        ~ 2
  )
)
E <- yap %>% 
  summarize(mean = mean(X))

yap_pdf <- yap %>% 
  count(X) %>% 
  mutate(p = n/nrow(yap),
         fxx = p * X ) %>% 
  summarize(E = sum(fxx))

yap %$% {
  mean(X)
}

integrand <- function(x) {
  x*dexp(x,2)
}

integrate(integrand,0,999)

```


```{r}
dgp <- function(n){
tibble(
  X = rnorm(n,-0.5,1),
  Y = runif(n),
  Z = X+Y
)
}

yeet <- dgp(10000)
d_e <- dgp(100000) %>% 
  summarize(EX = mean(X),
            EY = mean(Y),
            EZ = mean(Z)) #they are additive inverses
Density <- function(df, ...){
  df %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_density(aes(x=...))
}

Density(yeet, X)
Density(yeet, Y)
Density(yeet, Z)
```
